Header.title: It's the Little Things
Header.paragraph: Our mission is to rebrand items that to us may seem “useless” or “basic” as blessings to share with many children who have not been able to receive love from a nurturing home.

About.paragraph: “It’s The Little Things” was inspired by my habit of turning empty gum wrappers into hearts. On many occasions these hearts were given to my friends or I would be asked to teach them how to make one. Watching the smiles on my friend’s faces and my own grow after seeing them so excited to know how to make a tiny heart made me realize it is truly our small experiences that add excitement to our lives. I then turned my focusfocal point from my friends to a less fortunate side of our community. Hundreds of kids in orphanages are unable to experience the simple joys in life whether it’s folding a gum wrapper, racing with toy cars, or painting nails. Our favorite activities that we perform or performed in our everyday lives are something that some children are unable to experience. With that being said our goal is to come together as a community to build goodie bags with “little things” that would shine some light onto any child’s day.

Features.title: Volunteering
Features.text: Gives students the opportunity to earn volunteer hours through simple yet community building activities.

Features.title: Fundraising
Features.text: Come together to host events that raise money for our cause.

Features.title: Teamwork
Features.text: Work as a whole to branch out on new ideas and ways to continue to grow our community.

Features.title: Gratification
Features.text: Grow our gratification by seeing the world through others' point of views.
